mdRecord.dcterms:title: Account, Martha Washington with MacLeod & Lumsdon for sundries, 1800 February 18
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Macleod & Lumsdon
mdRecord.dcterms:description: List of items purchased by Martha Washington from Macleod & Lumsdon, dated at the top 18 February 1800, Alexandria. The accounts, dated 8 July and 9 August, include entries for 47 panes of glass, oil, paint for 30 mahoghany chairs, paint for a wine cooler, varnishing, picture frame gilding, and glazing. Signed by Macleod & Lumdsdon at the bottom, noting that the above money was received in full 9 October 1800. Autograph document signed, 1 page.
